link_signal_attribute - out.description: Attribute to put bitly link on output signals. If unspecified, original link attribute is overridden.

link_signal_attribute - in.description: Attribute of inputs signals that contains a link.

nio/Bitly.Description: A block that creates a bitly url. Each input signal will be sent to output with the bitly link added on.
nio/Bitly.Input: Any list of signals. They should contain the attribute specified in the property `link_signal_attribute (in)`.
nio/Bitly.Output: Input signals but with the attribute `link_signal_attribute (out)` set to the bitly link generated from the attribute `link_signal_attribute (in)`.
